title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Unlawful maternity and pregnancy discrimination is now more common in Britain’s workplaces than ever before, with 54,000 pregnant women and new mothers forced out of their jobs in 2015.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will reverse the unfair employment tribunal fees which literally price people out of justice.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will also extend the time period for applying for maternity discrimination to the employment tribunal from three to six months.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will work with the Health and Safety Executive to make mandatory a workplace risk assessment for pregnant women so necessary adaptions can be made,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and review support for women who have miscarriages.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: LGBT EQUALITY
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour has a proud record of championing the fight for LGBT equality.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We abolished Section 28,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: equalised the age of consent,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: created civil partnerships,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and it was only through Labour votes that equal marriage became law.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: However, there is still a long way to go on issues such as education,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: equal access to public services,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: levels of LGBT hate crime,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and mental and physical wellbeing.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: A Labour government will reform the Gender Recognition Act and the Equality Act 2010 to ensure they protect Trans people by changing the protected characteristic of ‘gender assignment’ to ‘gender identity’
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and remove other outdated language such as ‘transsexual’.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will bring the law on LGBT hate crimes into line with hate crimes based on race and faith, by making them aggravated offences.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: To tackle bullying of LGBT young people, Labour will ensure that all teachers receive initial and ongoing training on the issues students face and how to address them.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: And we will ensure that the new guidance for relationships and sex education is LGBT inclusive.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Likewise, we will ensure all frontline health and social care professionals receive ongoing training to understand and meet the needs of LGBT patients and service users.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will ensure that NHS England completes the trial programme to provide PrEP as quickly as possible, and fully roll out the treatment to high-risk groups to help reduce HIV infection.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: DIVERSE COMMUNITIES
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Now more than ever, we need to celebrate the profound and enriching transformation brought by the diversity of people in this country, with all their different experiences, ta ents and contributions.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Today Black and Asian-owned businesses are an important and growing feature of our economy and society.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: These businesses are important not just because of their financial contribution; they have also helped transform particular sectors of the economy.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The Labour Party is the party of equality.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We seek to build a society free from all forms of racism, antiSemitism and Islamophobia.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We should all be deeply troubled by the rise in racially aggravated attacks and race hate crime in the past year.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Anti-Semitic incidents are also on the rise once more and we are committed to combatting this trend with adequate resources and firm political will.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Commissioning a report on our own party was an unprecedented step in British politics, demonstrating a commitment to tackling prejudice wherever it is found.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour is already acting on recommendations, including reform of internal disciplinary procedures to make them firmer and fairer,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and expansion of training to tackle anti-Semitism.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: On a matter of such importance, Labour urges all democratic political parties to do the same.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will end racism and discrimination against Gypsy, Roma and Traveller communities,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and protect the right to lead a nomadic way of life.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Black and Asian workers still suffer a massive pay gap.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: By introducing equal pay audit requirements on large employers, Labour will close this pay gap.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: By making the Minimum Wage a real Living Wage, we will benefit ethnic minority workers who are more likely to be on low pay.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will implement the Parker Review recommendations to increase ethnic diversity on the boards of Britain’s largest companies.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Over the last seven years people with disabilities have been failed by the Conservative government.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: People with disabilities have been vilified with divisive rhetoric like ‘scroungers’ and ‘shirkers’.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: In this climate, recorded disability hate crime has increased.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Last year the UN published a report concluding that the Conservative government had committed “grave, systematic violations of the rights of persons with disabilities”.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Currently 4.2 million People with disabilities live in poverty in Britain,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and the disability employment gap remains stubbornly high.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour believes in the social model of disability – that it is society which disables people, and it is our job to remove those barriers.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The previous Labour government signed the UN Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCRPD).
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The next Labour government will sign the UNCRPD into UK law.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will act to tackle discrimination,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: remove barriers
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and ensure social security delivers dignity and empowerment, not isolation and stigma.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will legislate to make terminal illness a protected characteristic under the Equality Act.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Autism covers a wide range of conditions that reflect neurological differences among people.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will work with employers, trade unions and public services to improve awareness of neurodiversity in the workplace and in society.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will give British Sign Language full recognition as a recognised language.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: CHAPTER 12 A GLOBAL BRITAIN
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will take all necessary measures to protect the security of our citizens and country.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will put conflict resolution
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and human rights at the heart of foreign policy,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: commit to working through the UN,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: end support for unilateral aggressive wars of intervention
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and back effective action to alleviate the refugee crisis.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Unlike the Conservatives, Labour believes Britain’s foreign policy should be guided by the values of peace,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: universal rights
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and international law.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Today, these values are being tested.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: As we leave the European Union, keeping Britain global is one of our country’s most urgent tasks.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We face the most complex, interwoven security and development challenges of our time;
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: ongoing wars across the Middle East,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: unprecedented numbers of refugees,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: global terrorism,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: climate change,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: the threat of nuclear conflict,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: a devastating food crisis across East Africa and beyond,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: an erratic US administration
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and a more combative government in Russia.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The lessons of the past, including those from the Chilcot Inquiry, show why our response to these challenges must be different.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We cannot seek to solve the world’s problems on our own, but instead must exhaust diplomatic solutions alongside international, regional and local partners within the framework of international law.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: This will require a modern and inclusive strategy, uniting the interwoven foreign policy instruments of diplomacy, defence and development.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: DIPLOMACY
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour recognises that, in leaving the EU, Britain will face both challenges and opportunities.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We are deeply ambitious for our country’s future and will draw on our international networks to make Britain a champion of multilateral engagement.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will invest in the UK’s diplomatic services, rebuilding some of the key capabilities lost as a result of Tory cuts.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Since the Second World War, Britain’s most important diplomatic relationship has been with the US.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: But that special relationship is based on shared values.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: When the current Trump administration chooses to ignore them, whether by discriminating on the basis of religion or breaking its climate change commitments, we will not be afraid to disagree.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: From the Middle East to Africa, in recent years millions of people have been killed, injured or displaced through wars, terrorism and military intervention.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: In Syria alone, more than 400,000 people have been killed.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will work tirelessly to end the conflict and get the diplomatic process back on track,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: while fully supporting international efforts to investigate, prosecute and convict the perpetrators of war crimes.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour is strongly committed to reducing human suffering caused by war.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will publish a strategy for protecting civilians in conflict, setting out detailed plans for work on conflict prevention and resolution,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: postconflict peacebuilding,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: And justice for the victims of war crimes.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour has created a Minister for Peace and Disarmament to lead this work.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour is committed to a comprehensive peace in the Middle East based on a two-state solution – a secure Israel alongside a secure and viable state of Palestine.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: There can be no military solution to this conflict and all sides must avoid taking action that would make peace harder to achieve.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: That means both an end to the blockade, occupation and settlements, and an end to rocket and terror attacks.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will continue to press for an immediate return to meaningful negotiations leading to a diplomatic resolution.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: A Labour government will immediately recognise the state of Palestine.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will also urge negotiations towards a political resolution in all other regions currently experiencing conflict, including Kashmir, Libya, Nigeria, Sudan, South Sudan, Somalia and Yemen,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and give our strong support to those countries already working to end decades of division, including Colombia, Cyprus and the Democratic Republic of Congo.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: In other regions, including the Korean Peninsula and the South China Sea, rising tensions threaten global peace.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Under a Labour government, Britain will work to reduce those tensions through an insistence on multilateral political dialogue.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: From Afghanistan and Iraq to the streets of European cities, Daesh continues to commit acts of indiscriminate barbarism.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will take all lawful action necessary to counter and confront this evil,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and we will advocate a long-term multinational political strategy, led by regional actors, to tackle the spread of extremism.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: In our discussions with different governments, including China, Egypt, the Gulf States, Myanmar, the Philippines, Russia and Turkey, we will urge respect for human rights
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and the rule of law.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will review all training and equipment contracts with repressive regimes, to ensure that Britain never colludes in the mistreatment of civilians.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will always stand up for the rights, interests and self-determination of Britain’s overseas territories and their citizens, whether protecting the sovereignty of the Falkland Islands against anyone who would seek to challenge it, or supporting the right of the Chagos isla nders to return to their homelands.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will reclaim Britain’s leading role in tackling climate change, working hard to preserve the Paris Agreement and deliver on international commitments to reduce emissions while mitigating the impacts of climate change on developing countries.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: While strengthening our commitment to the UN, we also acknowledge its shortcomings, particularly in light of repeated abuses of the veto power by some permanent members of the UN Security Council.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will work with our international partners to build support for UN reform and make its institutions more effective and responsive.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will appoint dedicated global ambassadors for women’s rights, LGBT rights and religious freedom to fight discrimination and promote equality globally.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Exports, trade and investment play a vital role in creating jobs and growth in Britain,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and Labour supports the considerable contribution that a responsible, world-leading defence and security industry makes to the UK economy.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: However, we also believe that strong export controls have a vital role to play in sustaining a legitimate trade in arms, while protecting UKjobs and R&D.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will therefore implement the Arms Trade Treaty to a consistently high standard, including ceasing arms exports to countries where there is concern that they will be used to violate international humanitarian law (IHL).
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: In particular, Labour will demand a comprehensive, independent, UN-led investigation into alleged violations of IHL in Yemen, including air strikes on civilians by the Saudi-led coalition.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will immediately suspend any further arms sales for use in the conflict until that investigation is concluded.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour remains committed to an independent inquiry into Britain’s military role in the 1984 raid on the Golden Temple in Amritsar.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: DEFENCE
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The primary duty of any government is to protect and defend its citizens.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We live in a period of growing international tensions.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: A strong, viable and sustainable defence and security policy must be strategic and evidence led.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: As previous incoming governments have done, a Labour government will order a complete strategic defence and security review when it comes into office, to assess the emerging threats facing Britain, including hybrid and cyber warfare.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Cyber security will form an integral part of our defence and security strategy and we will introduce a cyber-security charter for companies working with the Ministry of Defence.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will ensure that our armed forces are properly equipped and resourced to respond to wide-ranging security challenges.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will commit to effective UN peacekeeping, including support for a UN Emergency Peace Service.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: As the security threats and challenges we face are not bound by geographic borders, it is vital that as Britain leaves the EU, we maintain our close relationship with our European partners.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Alongside our commitment to NATO, we will continue to work with the EU on a range of operational missions to promote and support global and regional security.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The last Labour government consistently spent above the NATO benchmark of 2 per cent of GDP.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Conservative spending cuts have put Britain’s security at risk, shrinking the army to its smallest size since the Napoleonic wars.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The scrapping of Nimrod, HMS Ark Royal and the Harrier jump jets have weakened our defences and cost British taxpayers millions.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour’s commitment to spending at least 2 per cent of GDP on defence will guarantee that our Armed Forces have the necessary capabilities to fulfil the full range of obligations,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and ensure our conventional forces are versatile and able to deploy in a range of roles.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour supports the renewal of the Trident nuclear deterrent.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: As a nuclear-armed power, our country has a responsibility to fulfil our obligations under the Nuclear Non- Proliferation Treaty.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will lead multilateral efforts with international partners and the UN to create a nuclear-free world.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The UK defence industry is worldleading, and Labour will continue to support development and innovation in this sector and to ensure that it can continue to rely on a highly skilled workforce.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We are committed to a procurement process that supports the British steel industry and defence manufacturing industry,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: which in turn provide good jobs throughout the supply chain.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will publish a Defence Industrial Strategy White Paper, including a National Shipbuilding Strategy to secure a long-term future for the industry, workers and UK defence.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We have a duty to properly reward and remunerate our Armed Forces.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Under the Conservatives, our Armed Forces have been hit by rent rises, pay restraint, and changes to tax and benefits, putting real pressure on service personnel and their families.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will ensure they get the pay and living conditions that their service merits.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Dedicated service personnel are at the heart of our defence policy.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will immediately examine recruitment and retention policies in order to stem the exodus seen under the Conservatives.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will publish new strategic equality objectives to ensure our personnel reflect our diverse society.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will drive up standards in Service Accommodation, and take action where private companies have failed to deliver.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will consult with service personnel, giving them greater autonomy over their housing choices,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and review and improve the Forces Help to Buy scheme.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Personnel who are injured while serving should have prompt access to support and compensation.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will resist any Conservative proposals to abolish the right to seek legal redress against the MoD where compensation claims cannot be otherwise settled.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We are fully committed to supporting our veterans.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will promote greater awareness of the Armed Forces Covenant,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: seek greater consistency in its implementation by public authorities,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and promote increased participation in the Corporate Covenant.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will also roll out a Homes Fit for Heroes programme that will insulate the homes of disabled veterans for free.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: DEVELOPMENT
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour has a proud record on international development.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will continue to spend 0.7 per cent of gross national income on ofFcial development assistance,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and develop a targeted development agenda based on the principles of redistribution,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: social justice,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: women’s rights
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and poverty reduction.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will take robust action to end the self-regulation of Department for International Development private contractors, establishing and enforcing new rules to ensure aid is used to reduce poverty for the many, not to increase profits for the few.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We fully support the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) agreed globally to eradicate poverty
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and protect the environment.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will develop a cross-government strategy for ensuring the SDGs are implemented, and report annually to Parliament on our performance.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: In the wake of Brexit, to fulfil our national obligations under the SDGs, Labour will guarantee the least developed countries continued access to the UK market to protect vital export revenues.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: There are more refugees and displaced people around the world than at any time since the Second World War.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: This is a failure of diplomacy,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: conflict resolution
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and of human rights, which is why they will be at the heart of Labour’s foreign policy.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The Conservatives have completely failed to show any leadership on this issue.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: In the first 100 days of government, we will produce a cross-departmental strategy to meet our international obligations on the refugee crisis.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: The current global tax system is deeply unjust.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Africa’s economies alone lose more than £46 billion annually through corruption and tax evasion – more than 10 times what they receive in aid.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will act decisively on tax havens, introducing strict standards of transparency for crown dependencies and overseas territories, including a public register of owners, directors, major shareholders and beneficial owners for all companies and trusts.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will work in partnership with communities in the Global South to develop long-term strategies for strengthening economies and societies.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We would reinstate the Civil Society Challenge Fund to support trade unions, women’s associations and other civil society organisations which are the most effective forces in winning human rights and workers’ rights.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Jobs in global supply chains can be of enormous importance to working people across the Global South, but human rights abuses and exploitation of lower environmental standards and workers’ rights are too common.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour is committed to ensuring respect for human rights,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: workers’ rights
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and environmental sustainability in the operations of British businesses around the world,
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: and we will work to tighten the rules governing corporate accountability for abuses in global supply chains.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: Labour will work with business to ensure the provisions of the Modern Slavery Act are fully respected, including reporting on due diligence in supply chains.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will extend the remit of the Groceries Code Adjudicator beyond direct suppliers to ensure fair treatment for all those producing goods for the UK’s largest supermarkets.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: At least a billion people around the world cannot currently obtain the health services they need, and another 100 million are pushed below the poverty line as a result of paying for their services.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will establish a Centre for Universal Health Coverage, providing global partnerships, support and encouragement to countries that want UHC, helping them to generate the funding and systems required for its delivery.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017

text: We will invest in new public-health driven research and development to find effective and affordable treatments for diseases in the developing world, including fighting TB, malaria, HIV/AIDS and neglected tropical diseases.
title: For the many not the few. The Labour Party manifesto 2017
